msg: Fix for JAMES-281.  Emit a separate Return-Path: header for each header in the original message.

msg: Fix for JAMES-276.  Paths are relative to location of config.xml

author: hilmer
msg: DNSServer did not implement Disposable, and thus did not have a chance to stop the dnsjava cachecleaner thread on shutdown.

author: hilmer
msg: DSNBounce added. Possible NullPointerException in AbtractNotify resolved.
Added description of DSNBounce to provided_mailets.
